title: Interior Minister’s brother Tariq Shah passes away
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 24 (APP):President District Bar Association (DBA) Nankana Sahib Pir Tariq Shah, brother of Interior Minister Ijaz Ahmed Shah, passed away on Monday.
The deceased was under treatment at a Lahore Hospital. Last month, the minister’s brother Pir Hassan Ahmed Shah had also died.
Ijaz Ahmad Shah has requested the people for prayer.
